name: Red Tide (ohsurewalktothesun)
description:
This is my submission for Spring Game Jammin' held between April 9-11 2021. It's my first game jam submission!

The theme for this jam was: BLOOMING

For the game jam's theme, I thought it would be interesting to create something around algae blooms. I was trying to imagine an ocean world that had only one piece of land on it. If people lived on such a place (and couldn't live in the water) how would people cope and survive? What would happen if there was an ecological disaster?

Controls: Use the arrow keys for navigation, advancing dialog, and interacting with sprites.

This game was made using Bitsy. It also uses a couple of Bitsy hacks:

  • Avatar by room (by Sean S. LeBlanc)
  • Fontsy (by Sean S. LeBlanc)
